name: The Talos Principle: Road to Gehenna
summary: This substantial expansion consists of four episodes that take experienced players through some of the most advanced and challenging puzzles yet. The Talos Principle writers Tom Jubert and Jonas Kyratzes have returned to pen the expansion and show players an entirely different side of Elohim's world through a journey to Gehenna filled with new characters and a new society with its own history and philosophy.
storyline: The Talos Principle: Road to Gehenna follows the narrative of Uriel, Elohim's messenger, as he explores a strange, hidden part of the simulation on a mission of mercy and redemption in an attempt to free the souls of the damned at all costs.

esrb.synopsis: This is a puzzle game in which players assume the role of an android that must navigate themed environments full of spacial puzzles. From a first-person perspective, players must move objects to unlock doors, bypass obstacles, and avoid various hazards (e.g., stationary gun turrets and exploding drones). Robotic drones can be destroyed, resulting in mild explosions; realistic gunfire is heard as turrets fire at players.

pegi.synopsis: Non realistic looking violence towards fantasy characters.
